idea-plugin.name: Spring URL Extractor
idea-plugin.description:
Extract complete URLs from Spring controllers including context path from application.yml/properties files.

Features:
  • Right-click on controller methods to get full URL
  • Automatically detects context path from configuration files
  • Supports both @RequestMapping and shorthand annotations
  • Works with application.yml and application.properties
  • Keyboard shortcut: Ctrl+Alt+U

action.description: Extract complete URL including context path
